title: [Large-Scale] Constructivist-Based E-Learning Interaction Design: Language Learning Simulation

context.additional_context: Enhanced language interaction learning in limited-technology environments using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can perform language interactions reflecting cultural contexts with over 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments

Through problem-solving activities based on constructivist principles (e.g., role-play, scenario analysis), learners can construct context-specific meanings of ten or more linguistic expressions and achieve 80%+ appropriateness in peer evaluations and instructor feedback
Learners share language usage contexts three or more times and provide feedback through mobile platform-based collaborative activities with peer learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
